compliant.section: Information we process with your consent
compliant.legal provisions: Processing based on consent is compliant with the TWPDP as it outlines the need for explicit consent for processing personal data.

compliant.section: Information we process for the purposes of legitimate interests
compliant.legal provisions: Processing based on legitimate interests is compliant as it considers the necessity and reasonableness of processing.

compliant.section: Information we process because we have a legal obligation
compliant.legal provisions: Processing for compliance with legal obligations is compliant with TWPDP.

compliant.section: Specific uses of information you provide to us
compliant.legal provisions: The policy states that payment information is not collected, which aligns with the principle of data minimization.

non_compliant.section: Information we process with your consent
non_compliant.legal provisions: The policy does not clearly state how users can withdraw consent in a straightforward manner.
non_compliant.amend: Include a clear and accessible method for users to withdraw consent at any time, not just through email.

non_compliant.section: Sending a message to our support team
non_compliant.legal provisions: The policy does not specify the retention period for personal data collected through support communications.
non_compliant.amend: Add a section detailing how long personal data will be retained and the criteria used to determine that period.
